name: Bearoness
description:
You, the most beautiful princess in the land, have been cursed by a witch to walk the earth as a bear! The only way to reverse your curse: infiltrate the castle ball, and win the love of the prince!

Use stealth and disguise to make your way through the ball, while switching between two and four legs in order to hide from curious aristocrats and suspicious guards!

Bearoness is a stealth game created by Flavor Explosion for a seven-week class project.
